title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 154.5 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 154.5 - Exceptions

State Regulations

The restrictions and limitations of this Part may be waived
by the Director of the Budget if it is determined that such restrictions and
limitations would result in an unusual and unavoidable hardship for the
employee/appointee being relocated, transferred, reassigned, promoted or
appointed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
154.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
